control.description-key: Displays an alert dialog containing a message and a button

property.name: title
property.description-key: The title of the alert dialog

property.name: text
property.description-key: The message to be displayed in the alert dialog

property.name: confirmButtonLabel
property.description-key: The confirm button label. If you do not specify the button label, OK is used as the button label

property.name: height
property.description-key: Height of the alert dialog in pixels

property.name: width
property.description-key: Width of the alert dialog in pixels
